page.title: 18Work near Barkestone
page.content: Employment has changrd very much in the villages in the last 50 years.Most people in the village used to work on local farms or at home,but now most people have to go to nearby towns for employment.There are still some farmers and farm workers but only about 3 or 4 people are needed to run a farm as the machines now do most of the jobs that were done by men and boys.Women and girls now go to work in offices and factories.Most of the men in the villages who go to the town are professionals or skilled workers.The others work at nearby cheese factories where Stilton cheese is made or dairies.The women used to work for rich households but now they too work in the local factories or offices,or are professional people.Most people travel to work by their own car or one belonging to their company.
